## Страницы

    var page = new Page({
        url: '/add/',
        init: function (request, response, callback) {},
        template: function (context) {}
    });
    
    page.request(request, response, function (text) {
        console.log(text);
    });

## Приложения

    var app = new Application({
        url: '/chat/',
        pages: [{}, {}, {}]
    });
